price: هرچه در آسمان‌ها و زمین است متعلق به اوست؛ و او بلندمرتبه و بزرگ است.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿaliyu al-ʿaẓīmu
